entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Edmonton

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light early this morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or snow overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain or snow changing to wet snow in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
